name: Crimson Quest
description:
Crimson Quest is an Action Adventure 3rd person 3D Platformer Experience! Fight, Explore, and Save the Day! Game Info

Play as ??? the Blue Alien guy as he fights through waves of huge robotic enemies, solves various puzzles, and explores his way to the evil Crimson Weapons Lab.

Version Info

The current version is 1.0. This is the first publicly available version and this game will not receive any further development. Different executables are available which each support different control / input types.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Camera - Mouse Move
  • Strafe / Aim - Right Click / Left Shift
  • Block - Left Control
  • Jump - Space
  • Shoot - Left Click

PS4 Controller

  • Move - Left Joystick
  • Camera - Right Joystick
  • Strafe / Aim - L2
  • Block - L1
  • Jump - X
  • Shoot - R2

Xbox One Controller

  • Move - Left Joystick
  • Camera - Right Joystick
  • Strafe / Aim - LT
  • Block - LB
  • Jump - A
  • Shoot - RT
Installation

Installation couldn't be simpler, just double-click the downloaded executable of your choice and it will extract the files you need. Then open up the folder and launch the game!

Credits

This game was made in collaboration with:

  • Oliver Maddison
  • Scott Lewington
  • Lee Berry
Disclaimer

The plans for this one were originally much grander, with many more weapons, enemy types, and levels designed. But it ended up being rushed and it's far from perfect, but it's still kinda fun.

Enjoy Playing!
